message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,000. This is a great price, considering the value it brings to your business.
Alice, your offer is still a bit higher than I'd like to pay.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to pay $10,500 at this time.  Let me know if that works for you.

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still confident that this product will bring significant value to your business. Considering your offer of $10,500, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,800. This is a fair compromise that still allows me to make a profit while also accommodating your budget.
